Main Document Content:
Description:
As a Supplier | Digital Content Controller I want to deliver journal content to Silverchair via APS 24 So that my Silverchair journals workflow benefits from the latest APS design/infrastructure
Context
Currently the business  deliver  journal content to Silverchair via APS 1.9. This ticket is to add a workflow for SC journals to the APS 24 unified workflow.
Form Requirements
A Workflow dropdown option titled “Silverchair - Journals” is available in the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen. The pre-defined pipeline for all journals content would be JATS2SCJATS.
If this workflow is selected, the following form fill options are available for the user to input:
Submission type*
Dropdown list
Preview
Publish
Silverchair endpoint*
Dropdown list
Silverchair Staging
Silverchair Live (this option should only be available on Prod)
Include content from all folders EXCEPT
Dropdown list
Note this exclusion list would override any file inclusions below
{issue}
{package}
assets
supplementary files
peer review pdf
This dropdown also includes a search box and option to Select All / Deselect All
If this is left blank, then ALL content is included as default.
Include all file types EXCEPT (this list should be generic across all forms - books/collections/journals, and should be alphabetically ordered)
Dropdown list
doc/docx
jpg/jpeg
mrc /marc
tif /tiff
xls /xlsx
This dropdown also includes a search box and option to Select All / Deselect All
If this is left blank, then ALL content is included as default.
“Submit” button
Further notes
Folder exclusion logic trumps file exclusion (if you’ve excluded a folder, but opted to keep a filetype that is contained within that folder, any content of that filetype in an excluded folder will not be sent)
Delivery Requirements
Once workflow has been submitted it should appear as a row on the workflow records screen
Failed content should include a failure message
Successful content should deliver to Zipline in expected state (see AC)
Acceptance Criteria
Given that I have navigated to any journal  Issue or Article package  in Atlas, and launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen (by clicking “Deliver”) When I view the Workflow dropdown options Then I see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”
Given that I have selected the “Silverchair - Journals” workflow option When I view my form fill options Then they match the options outlined in the scope above
Given I have left one or more mandatory field blank When I select submit Then I see an error message pop up in the UI telling me which fields I need to populate
Given I have successfully completed all mandatory fields When I select submit Then my workflow is triggered And then when I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen, I see a row for each package included in my delivery with an initial status of “IN PROGRESS”
Given that my delivery has failed  When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “FAILED” against my package, with a failure reason
Given that my delivery has succeeded When I go to the Atlas Workflows → Records List APS 24 screen Then I see the status “SUCCESS” against my package
Given that my delivery was successful When I go to zipline Then I see my content delivered to expected endpoint, in expected state
Additional checks:
where Submission type is “preview” (and content has not previously been published) then content appears in zipline in an UNPUBLISHED state
where Submission type is “preview” (and content HAS previously been published) then content appears in zipline in an UNPUBLISHED state
where Submission type is “ publish ” content is loaded to zipline in a PUBLISHED state
where Silverchair endpoint is “Silverchair Staging” content is loaded to the staging site
where Silverchair endpoint is “Silverchair Live” content is loaded to the live site (note that this can only be tested on prod, users cannot deliver to live from lower  envs ).
verify folder exclusion logic works as expected
verify file exclusion logic works as expected
